words.defineVi: liên quan đến hoặc sinh kèm theo

examples: What's your nationality?
Clue one gives you a nationality and a color.
There was no word on the nationalities of the victims and survivors.
One: each house's owner is of a different nationality, drinks a different beverage, and smokes a different type of cigar.
Well, culture isn’t just about nationality, or the language you speak.
words.defineEn: the state of legally belonging to a country
words.defineVi: tình trạng thuộc về pháp lý của một quốc gia

examples: Eight is oct-, like octagon.
Start off with the octagon, working body control.
Finally, it's CarmonaCorrea's turn to enter the Octagon.
Narrator: Recruits face off in a structure known as the Octagon.
Imagine squaring off the outside of a pizza, so that instead of a circle, it’s an octagon.
words.defineEn: (geometry) a polygon consisting of eight straight sides and eight angles
words.defineVi: (hình học) đa giác có tám cạnh thẳng và tám góc

examples: Perfect octave!
His vocal range is reportedly over six octaves, going from E flat one to to E seven.
All told, we can hear between seven and eight octaves.
We say that they are an octave apart.
Partch was interested in micro-tonality and a 12 tone octave just wasn't enough.
words.defineEn: the interval between the first and the last notes in eight diatonic degrees
words.defineVi: quãng giữa nốt đầu và nốt cuối theo tám độ diatonic

words.defineEn: a book size resulting from folding a full sheet of paper three times to create eight leaves or 16 pages
words.defineVi: một kích thước cuốn sách do gấp ba lần một tờ giấy đầy đủ để tạo ra tám tờ hoặc 16 trang

examples: And their understanding of syntax suggests that they have their own language and grammar.
This combination of morphology and syntax is also called morphosyntax.
We need what linguists call syntax.
There's one theory of syntax that actually argues there are determiner phrases as well as noun phrases.
In healthy brains, Broca’s area seems to monitor for syntax errors.
words.defineVi: một sự sắp xếp có trật tự có hệ thống

examples: Natural food coloring made from beet juice or turmeric is used in some products as a substitute for synthetic food dyes.
Synthetic polymers have extraordinary traits.
Synthetic chemicals also appeared in the mid-1800s.
This synthetic gas has applications beyond electricity generation.
A forensic test could have detected the synthetic resin.
words.defineEn: produced artificially, typically based on its natural version
words.defineVi: sản xuất nhân tạo, thường dựa trên phiên bản tự nhiên của nó

words.defineEn: on the Italian or Roman side of the Alps
words.defineVi: ở phía Ý hoặc La Mã của dãy núi Alps

examples: They're personally edifying to anybody who has them.
words.defineEn: to make someone develop intellectually or morally
words.defineVi: để làm cho ai đó phát triển trí tuệ hoặc đạo đức

examples: They make up a single, giant edifice obeying the same physical laws and all made from the same types of atoms, electrons, protons, quarks, neutrinos, that make up you and me.
So while the debate over the costs of their edifices rages on, libraries continue to occupy a very fraught liminal space between relic and living archive.
The party elders feared thatthe whole edifice of communism was going to collapse, like it was collapsing in theSoviet Union and in other partsof Eastern Europe.
words.defineEn: a structure that has a roof and walls and stands more or less permanently in one place
words.defineVi: một cấu trúc có mái và tường và ít nhiều đứng cố định ở một nơi

examples: Neutral bromine has one, two, three, four, five, six, seven valence electrons.
The bromine is right over here.
We clear out the bromine.
So that's bromine.
This is the bromine.
words.defineEn: a nonmetallic heavy volatile corrosive dark brown liquid element belonging to the halogens; found in sea water
words.defineVi: một nguyên tố chất lỏng màu nâu sẫm dễ bay hơi ăn mòn phi kim thuộc nhóm halogen; tìm thấy trong nước biển

examples: Now, it is bromide.
And now the bromide has left.
The positive charge on the carbocation is irresistibly taunting to the bromide ion.
And all along, the bromide anion had left in the previous step.
The bromide anion is floating around with its eight valence electrons, one, two, three, four, five, six, seven, and then it has this one right over here.
words.defineEn: any of the salts of hydrobromic acid; formerly used as a sedative but now generally replaced by safer drugs
words.defineVi: bất kỳ muối nào của axit bromhydric; trước đây được sử dụng làm thuốc an thần nhưng hiện nay thường được thay thế bằng các loại thuốc an toàn hơn

examples: I work as a florist.
Narrator: Local artists, ceramicists, bakers, and fellow florists also sold their products from socially distant booths.
Luckily, florists get around the daffodil’s penchant for destruction by putting them in a separate vase for at least a few hours to draw out the sap.
words.defineEn: a person whose job is arranging and selling flowers
words.defineVi: một người có công việc sắp xếp và bán hoa

examples: The grape vine in my backyard is flourishing, with clusters of ripe grapes ready for harvest.
Her professional life flourished.
High culture also flourished.
Life was flourishing.
The sciences flourished and advanced transportation, communication, and medicine.
words.defineEn: to grow or develop in a healthy and successful way
words.defineVi: để tăng trưởng hoặc phát triển một cách lành mạnh và thành công

examples: so I don't have to be merciful to him!'
(may these be granted you by the all-powerful and merciful God)
We remember him not only as a great general, but also as a good man who was merciful, wise and generous.
the Muslim commander told Balian when he came to talk, 'You said that you wanted to fight, so the time to be merciful is over!'
words.defineVi: hiển thị hoặc đưa ra lòng thương xót

examples: Born to an absent father and a mercurial mother, Byron had a brilliant mind, but was tormented due to being born with misshapen foot.
I mean, the president’s kind of mercurial style, his unpredictability, that’s not something that the immigration ideologues love, because they have an actual agenda they want to see enforced.
Mercurial disease, or Mad Hatter Disease, causes extreme emotional states plus physical effects, like tremors and difficulty walking, speaking, and writing.
words.defineEn: prone to unpredicted and sudden changes
words.defineVi: dễ bị thay đổi bất ngờ và đột ngột

examples: It's perhaps a little bit pompous from time to time, but down deep it's the same process as auctioneering cows at a farm or thoroughbreds.
words.defineEn: characterized by pomp and ceremony and stately display
words.defineVi: đặc trưng bởi sự hào hoa và nghi lễ và sự trưng bày trang nghiêm

examples: And you never can tell when there's a certain amount of pomposity or somebody who's making you play a particular role and if you just shake hands with somebody it's how do you do?
words.defineEn: lack of elegance as a consequence of being pompous and puffed up with vanity
words.defineVi: thiếu thanh lịch do hậu quả của sự hào hoa và phù phiếm
